item.title: About
item.description:
MY RESUME

BIO

Hi, I’m Oliver, a Technical Artist specializing in shaders and materials, currently working at Vanimals.

I graduated in 2019 from Limkokwing University of Creative Technology in Malaysia, where I studied game art development. I started my career as an Environment Artist and transitioned to a Technical Artist at Vanimals.

I work at an indie studio where I often juggle both art and tech roles. Currently, I focus on graphics, specifically shaders and rendering technology, blending artistic vision with technical skills to enhance both NPR and PBR graphics. I serve as a bridge between artists and tech teams, leveraging my negotiation and software skills to improve game visuals.

WORK EXPERIENCE

Vanimals

Roles

  • Technical Artist (SEP 2018 - PRESENT)
  • Technical Artist Intern (Dec 2018 - Mar 2019)

Responsibilities

  • Create shaders in HLSL/ShaderGraph/ASE for Unity.
  • Create models including environment and character in 3DsMax/Zbrush.
  • Create tools in C# for Unity, MaxScript/Python for 3DsMax.
  • Create VFX in Unity.
  • Create level art and light baking.
  • Develop tools to improve art pipeline and workflow.
  • Optimize asset pipeline and workflow.
  • Work closely with other team members to improve the game.

EDUCATION

  • Limkokwing University of Creative Technology, Malaysia
    • Bachelor of Arts (HONS) in Games Art Development
    • 2016-2019
    • GPA : 3.73

SKILLS

Type Skill
ART Modelling, Scuplting, Retopology, Unwrapping, Texturing, Lighting, VFX
TECH Shaders, Performance, Pipeline, Version Control, Tools
CODE C#, HLSL, GLSL, Blueprint, Python, MaxScript

SOFTWARE

Type Software
3D Modeling 3DS Max, Maya, ZBrush
Texturing Substance Designer, Substance Painter, Photoshop, Bodypaint
Version Control Git, SVN, Perforce
Engines Unity, Unreal Engine

LANGUAGES

Language Proficiency
Mandarin Native
English Working proficiency

CONTACT

  • LinkedIn
  • Twitter
  • Email
  • PhoneNumber:
